Ned's Shed. Let's Talk.

What is Ned's Shed?

Ned's Shed is a real and virtual space where Cornish Men can talk.

We're men right? Cornish men. We're not meant to share our feelings. Are we? Society expects us to deliver. And being in Cornwall, we're meant to be as tough as the elements and environment around us demand.

So what happens if you've got something bottled up and you need to share it? Because we all know the meaning of 'it's better out than in'.
Well if you're looking for somewhere, you've come to the right place.

How it works:

WHY OPENING UP IS DIFFICULT FOR US

Ever heard the phrase 'Man Up'? Revealing our emotions is a sign of weakness right? Well society is changing, we don't have to keep it all in anymore.

WE'RE ALL LISTENING MATE

If you have a problem, there's immediate support in the Shed. Where you have instant access to men who want to listen, help or just have a bit of banter.

COME ON IN

Enter the Shed and share whatever's on your mind. As we've said it's better out than in. Come to a meet up, or join or set up a video chat.

Chat Now

Gallery

Meet some of our members:

Ken, 41, Camborne

"I have never classed myself as a loner, but I did for many reasons find myself alone. Then I joined Ned's Shed and made new friends."

Mike, 38, Tintagel

"I found myself widowed at an early age, but Ned's Shed helped me start anew, and also provided an instant rugby team."

Cliff, 52, St Austell

"I was redundent for a while and had some health issues, but Ned's Shed help me realise I wasn't the only one."
